creditline: Gift of Harold and Mickey Smith
description: silver cup on pedestal foot with repousse and enamel decoration; design of fruits with painted scene in cartouche of seder
markings: on bottom stamped [NY&Co/7], another illegible mark stamped with [23] below, scratch weight
text: This is an Elijah cup, which is set out for the prophet Elijah during the Passover seder. Elijah is said to visit the seder of every Jew.
title: Elijah cup
